//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------//
//												CARD SHOP NPC
//	Emulator:	rAthena
//	Version:	1.0
//	Date:		09/25/2020
//	Author:		Wazaby
//	Type:		Custom NPC Script for cards
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------//

askald,60,154,4	script	Card Seller	412,{
	mes "[Cards Seller]";
	mes "Greetings!";
	mes "So you've decided to buy some cards eh?";
	mes "Go ahead, choose from our exclusive menu.";
	next;
	switch(select(" Accessory Cards: Footgear Cards : Garment Cards : Shield Cards : Weapon Cards : Armor Cards : Headgear Cards : Mini-boss Cards : Close")){
		case 1: // Accessory Cards
			mes "Accessory Cards";
			close2;
			callshop "accessory_cards",1;
			end;
		case 2: // 
			mes "Footgear Cards";
			close2;
			callshop "footgear_cards",1;
			end;
		case 3: // 
			mes "Garment Cards";
			close2;
			callshop "garment_cards",1;
			end;
		case 4: // 
			mes "Shield Cards";
			close2;
			callshop "shield_cards",1;
			end;
		case 5: //
			mes "Weapon Cards";
			close2;
			callshop "weapon_cards",1;
			end;
		case 6: //
			mes "Armor Cards";
			close2;
			callshop "armor_cards",1;
			end;
		case 7:
			mes "Headgear Cards";
			close2;
			callshop "headgear_cards",1;
			end;
		case 8:
			mes "Mini-Boss Cards";
			close2;
			callshop "mini_boss_cards",1;
			end;
		case 9:
			mes "Thank you for checking.";
			close;
			end;
		default:
			mes "That seems to be an invalid option.";
			close;
			end;
		}
}

-	shop	accessory_cards	-1,27026:250000,27183:250000,4040:250000,27120:250000,27125:250000,27161:250000,4252:250000,4344:250000,4347:250000,4356:250000,4215:250000,4327:250000,4212:250000,4262:250000,4293:250000,27165:250000,27322:250000,27323:250000,4385:250000,27019:250000,4154:250000,31019:250000,4349:250000,27163:250000,4152:250000,4149:250000,4418:250000,27018:250000,4283:250000,4355:250000,4377:250000,4331:250000,4437:250000,4232:250000,4103:250000,4321:250000,4433:250000,4265:250000,4139:250000,4091:250000,4027:250000,4193:250000,31020:250000,4552:250000,4079:250000,4196:250000,4084:250000,4205:250000,4036:250000,4093:250000,4256:250000,4632:250000,4631:250000,4077:250000,4073:250000,4389:250000,27107:250000,4048:250000,4175:250000,4033:250000,4294:250000,4436:250000,4187:250000,27171:250000,4219:250000,4505:250000,4326:250000,4230:250000,27170:250000,27108:250000,4416:250000,4228:250000,4044:250000,4415:250000,4022:250000,4227:250000,4424:250000,4224:250000,4028:250000,4282:250000,4587:250000,4209:250000,4053:250000,4348:250000,4264:250000,4034:250000,4190:250000,4051:250000,4064:250000
